timeline.message: Add missing error message; add optional control sensor to simulator; change messages to use display name

timeline.bodyText:
The traininfo files contain 2 fields, the ID (aka system name) and the Name (aka a sort of display name, but not quite)
There are 2 versions of the file v1 & v2. Neither will read correctly if you make these changes, necessitating the conversion, in may case of about 30 files, and in the clubs case a few hunderd). If you want to do this you need to add a version 3, you need to go from top to bottom of the dispatcher code to ensure that nowhere is it using explicitly a systemname.
timeline.author: Pugwash1

replies.bodyText:
Thank you for the insight into train info versions.  I have implemented version 3.  The load process takes care of converting the transit and block names for either version 1 or version 2.
I also changed the log statements to use the USERNAME_SYSTEMNAME DisplayOption instead of DISPLAYNAME.  They were originally just the system name.
